name: stellify-mcp
description: Build Laravel and Vue.js apps through conversation with AI-native structured code editing
long_description:
Stellify MCP bridges Claude with Stellify - an AI-native code generation platform. Unlike traditional file-based code, Stellify stores code as structured JSON in a database, enabling:

- **Surgical, statement-level edits** - AI can modify specific code statements without risk of breaking surrounding code
- **Queryable code** - Find all methods using a specific class, trace dependencies instantly
- **34 specialized tools** for project management, file/method creation, Vue component building, UI elements, and a reusable code library
- **Incremental development workflow** - Build applications step-by-step with full type safety

Supports Laravel/PHP (controllers, models, middleware) and Vue.js (reactive components, event handlers, templates).
